alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Richland (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:43AM CDT until June 14 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Central Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 442 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Buckner, or 14 miles south of Monroe, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Alto around 450 AM CDT. Mangham and Archibald around 455 AM CDT. Baskin around 500 AM CDT. Winnsboro around 505 AM CDT. Crowville around 510 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
